headline: Get updates on the health of your origin where you need them

description: We are thrilled to announce Health Checks availability within Cloudflareâ€™s centralized Notification tab, available to all Pro, Business, and Enterprise customers. Now, you can get critical alerts on the health of your origin without checking your inbox!
